definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: While the politicians ride in limos , ordinary people have no decent transportation.
sentences.chinese: 政客们坐着豪华轿车，普通人却没有象样的交通工具。
但是他有一辆豪华轿车。

sentences.english: There are some amazing limousines available for hire in the Midlands area.
sentences.chinese: 有一些惊人的豪华轿车可供租用的中部地区。

sentences.english: “I hope you refused the limousine, ” Kostya said.
sentences.chinese: “我希望你没要他租那辆豪华轿车，”克斯特亚说。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE:There are several luxurious cars in the automobile dealer's showroom.
sentences.chinese: 这家汽车销售商的展室中有几款豪华轿车。

sentences.english: Jack gets inside the limo’s backseat and questions Cofell again.
sentences.chinese: 杰克进入豪华轿车的后座，再次询问科菲尔。

sentences.english: His wish is to buy a luxurious car in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 他的希望是在不远的将来买一辆豪华轿车。

sentences.english: Taxis and, yes, limos are culprits.
sentences.chinese: 她说的没错，出租车和豪华轿车就是罪魁祸首。

sentences.english: Passengers will be able to enjoy comfort equal to that of a luxury limousine or private jet.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可享受到与豪华轿车或私家飞机一样的舒适。

sentences.english: This is a luxurious car complete with air conditioning and telephone.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆附有空调设备和电话的豪华轿车。

sentences.english: We watched as he got into a large black limousine and sped away.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着他钻进一辆黑车豪华轿车飞驰而去了。

sentences.english: Oren pushes a button on a detonator, and the limo explodes.
sentences.chinese: 欧伦按下了引爆器的按钮，豪华轿车爆炸了。

sentences.english: Cofell arrives in the garage and gets inside his limo.
sentences.chinese: 拉菲尔抵达了停车场，坐进了他的豪华轿车里。

sentences.english: She has a chauffeur - driven limousine .
sentences.chinese: 她有一辆由私人司机开的豪华轿车。

sentences.english: Having never driven a limo, he asked the chauffeur if he could drive for a while.
sentences.chinese: 他没开过豪华轿车，于是问司机能不能让他开会儿。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
